name: Cycle Hero
description: A game where you move and shoot your way through enemies on a motorcycle. I apologize for the lack of sound effects and music (I ran out of time).  This was made for the third Extra Credits game jam and I made this game in 3 days. The controls are, arrow keys to move, space bar to shoot, r to restart, and q to quit. Also for full screen mode, press F1. Enjoy!
